input_args.text: 'posted by Eddie Every once in a while, a genius comes along and produces a summary so succinct and beautiful that you can’t help but praise it. This is one of these posts. For the uninformed: tl;dr = too long; didn’t read. Note: there is no source given as I kept the Facebook poster anonymous. We know that the internet is a cesspool of trolls, so keeping the poster anonymous prevents said trolls from contacting him/her. Source:'
